name: Brew Bus: Aliens
description:
You have to fend off aliens as your bus driver Carl is falling asleep!

Switch between shooting aliens with your high tech turret mounted to the back of the bus and hopping infront of the cutting edge coffee machine to speed brew your driver awake!

CONTROLS

  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Spacebar - Start brewing, advance to next step of brewing
  • Mash A & D to grind the coffee!
  • Press S at the right time to steam the milk! you can retry with R if you're not satisfied
  • Hold A to pour the coffee and D to pour the milk into Carls coffee cup! He likes a 1:2 ratio of espresso to milk in his coffee
